topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/movie-night-at-the-booru/post/557272c26368727cbabd0b00#post_557272c26368727cbabd0b00
[bq="EHAN"]So I watched Tarzan for the first time in years...

God I seriously forgot how great it was. I can't find a single complaint about the movie in all honesty. I love each and every single one of the characters, the story is told beautifully and at times I'd argue perfectly, the atmosphere is gorgeous, I'm a sucker for the Phil Collins songs, the animation gets me quite invested, and it all just adds up to a movie that I personally can call perfect, in my eyes at least.

I hate to admit it to myself, but Mulan just got dethroned as my favorite Disney movie.

And since I can't find anything to complain about, I might as well call it my favorite movie of all time, since I was already thinking Mulan might be my favorite, among others, but Tarzan broke through and shot past just about every single one of my favorites.

So yeah, I didn't remember how great Tarzan was, but now that I watched it again when I'm older and more appreciative of movies that I last watched as a younger kid, I absolutely know that I love it now.

[spoiler]10/10[/spoiler][/bq]
my post from the movie thread, might as well post it here too
